assertion.label: Change Details
assertion.name: change_details
assertion.value: The original version of this Article contained an error in the spelling of the author Y. Surget-Groba, which was incorrectly given as J. Surget-Groba. This has now been corrected in both the PDF and HTML versions of the Article.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.
